<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/accounts/me/stats"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get the Account statistics, such the number of products, product groups and urls in the KG.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"The Account statistics","properties":{"account_id":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","description":"The account ID."},"entities":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","description":"The number of entities."},"entities_with_url":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","description":"The number of entities with URL."},"product_groups":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","description":"The number of product groups in the KG."},"products":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","description":"The number of products in the KG."}},"required":["account_id","entities","entities_with_url","product_groups","products"],"title":"AccountStats"}}},"description":"Found"},"401":{"description":"Authentication Failure"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
